title: Account Management - Contract Renewal
description: A client's annual managed services contract is due for renewal in 60 days.

tasks.description: The account manager contacts the client to initiate the renewal discussion.
tasks.expected_outcome: A meeting is scheduled to discuss the renewal.

tasks.description: Generate the renewal contract document from a template.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new contract document is created.

tasks.description: Send the contract to the client for e-signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client signs and returns the renewal contract, ensuring service continuity.
